Requirement_Description: Users shall be able to log in to the website using email and password
Users shall be able to reset their password if forgotten
Users shall be able to log in using their Facebook account
Users shall be able to log in using their Google account
Users shall be able to register on the website with a registration form
Registration form shall capture first name
Registration form shall capture last name
Registration form shall capture email address
Registration form shall capture contact number
Registration form shall capture password
Registration form shall capture password confirmation
Registration form shall require acceptance of terms and conditions
Email verification shall be mandatory before users can log in
Users shall receive an email verification link upon registration
Users shall be able to verify their email by clicking the verification link
Users shall be able to log in only after email verification is complete
Admin users shall be able to log in to the admin panel
Admin users shall enter username and password to log in
Admin users shall be able to reset their password if forgotten
Users shall be able to search for products by keyword
Users shall be able to browse products by category
Users shall be able to browse products by sub-category
Users shall be able to use filters to refine product search
Users shall be able to use sorting options to order search results
Users shall be able to search for products without logging in
Users shall be able to view product listings with product title
Users shall be able to view product listings with thumbnail image
Users shall be able to view product listings with price
Users shall be able to view product listings with ratings and reviews
Users shall be able to click on product title to navigate to product detail page
Users shall be able to click on product image to navigate to product detail page
Users shall be able to view product listings without logging in
Users shall be able to view all product details without logging in
Users shall be able to check shipping availability by entering PIN code
Product detail page shall display product title
Product detail page shall display thumbnail image
Product detail page shall display multiple product images
Product detail page shall display product description
Product detail page shall display price
Product detail page shall display available sizes
Product detail page shall display available colors
Product detail page shall display ratings and reviews
Users shall be able to add products to shopping cart from product detail page
Users shall be able to add products to wishlist from product detail page
Users must be registered and logged in to maintain a wishlist
Users shall be able to view items in their wishlist
Users shall be able to add products to their wishlist
Users shall be able to delete products from their wishlist
Users shall be able to proceed to checkout from wishlist items
Users shall be able to share products on social media
Login shall not be required to share products on social media
Users shall be able to share products from the product detail page
Users shall be able to add products to shopping cart from product detail page
Users must be registered and logged in to manage shopping cart items
Users shall be able to add items to shopping cart
Users shall be able to remove items from shopping cart
Users shall be able to update quantity of items in shopping cart
Users shall be able to proceed to checkout from shopping cart
Users shall be able to view item price in shopping cart
Users shall be able to view sub-total in shopping cart
Users shall be able to view total price in shopping cart
Only items selected from shopping cart shall be included in checkout
Users must be logged in to checkout and make payment
Users shall enter billing address before checkout
Users shall enter shipping address before checkout
Users shall select payment method (credit/debit card or net banking)
Users shall be able to view order summary before payment
Order summary shall display item total
Order summary shall display sub-total
Order summary shall display shipping cost
Order summary shall display tax
Order summary shall display order total
Users shall receive email notifications for order status updates
Users shall be able to place orders after successful payment
Users shall receive order confirmation after placing an order
Users shall be able to view list of all past orders
Users shall be able to view order details including total amount paid
Users shall be able to view shipping address for each order
Users shall be able to view item quantity for each order
Users shall be able to view price per unit for each order
Users shall be able to reorder items from past orders
Users shall be able to track current orders from My Orders section
Users shall be able to manage profile details (email, phone number)
Users shall be able to change password
Users shall be able to manage addresses in address book
Users shall be able to access My Orders from My Account
Users shall be able to access My Wishlist from My Account
Users shall be able to access Shopping Cart from My Account
Users shall be able to access Ratings and Reviews from My Account
Users shall be able to log out from My Account
Users shall be able to add new addresses to address book
Users shall be able to edit existing addresses in address book
Users shall be able to delete addresses from address book
Users shall be able to select addresses from address book during checkout
Users shall be able to rate products they have ordered
Users shall be able to review products they have ordered
Users shall only be able to rate and review products they have ordered
Users must be logged in and registered to post ratings and reviews
Users shall be able to view product ratings in product listings
Users shall be able to view product reviews on product detail page
Users shall be able to view ratings and reviews without logging in
Users shall be able to contact support team via email
Users shall be able to post name in contact support form
Users shall be able to post email in contact support form
Users shall be able to post contact number in contact support form
Users shall be able to post message in contact support form
Admin shall receive email when user submits support request
Admin shall be able to view total number of active registered buyers
Admin shall be able to view total number of inactive registered buyers
Admin shall be able to view total number of products uploaded on website
Admin shall be able to view total revenue for today
Admin shall be able to view total revenue for current month
Admin shall be able to view all buyer account information
Admin shall be able to edit buyer account information
Admin shall be able to activate buyer accounts
Admin shall be able to deactivate buyer accounts
Admin shall be able to view buyer profile details
Admin shall be able to view buyer addresses
Admin shall be able to view buyer orders
Admin shall be able to view buyer wishlist
Admin shall be able to view buyer cart items
Admin shall be able to view list of all orders placed by buyers
Admin shall be able to view current status of each order
Admin shall be able to view order details
Admin shall be able to edit order details
Admin shall be able to update order status to "Open"
Admin shall be able to update order status to "Confirmed"
Admin shall be able to update order status to "In Process"
Admin shall be able to update order status to "Shipped"
Admin shall be able to update order status to "Delivered"
Admin shall be responsible for shipping orders placed by buyers
Admin shall be able to maintain shipping carrier information
Admin shall be able to maintain tracking ID for shipments
Admin shall be able to maintain current shipment status
Admin shall be able to maintain delivery location/address
Admin shall be able to maintain shipping cost
Admin shall be able to add product categories
Admin shall be able to edit product categories
Admin shall be able to activate product categories
Admin shall be able to deactivate product categories
Admin shall be able to add product sub-categories
Admin shall be able to edit product sub-categories
Admin shall be able to activate product sub-categories
Admin shall be able to deactivate product sub-categories
Admin shall be able to add new products to catalog
Admin shall be able to edit existing products in catalog
Admin shall be able to activate products
Admin shall be able to deactivate products
Admin shall be able to manage product name
Admin shall be able to manage product images
Admin shall be able to manage product description
Admin shall be able to manage product keywords
Admin shall be able to manage product color variations
Admin shall be able to manage product size variations
Admin shall be able to view payment information (bank account details)
Admin shall be able to edit payment information
Admin shall be able to view payment status of each order
System shall use Stripe payment gateway for online payments
Admin shall be able to approve ratings posted by buyers
Admin shall be able to reject ratings posted by buyers
Admin shall be able to approve reviews posted by buyers
Admin shall be able to reject reviews posted by buyers
Admin shall be able to view products uploaded by date range (From-To)
Admin shall be able to view products uploaded by month
Admin shall be able to view products uploaded by year
Admin shall be able to view revenue/total sales for today
Admin shall be able to view revenue/total sales for current week
Admin shall be able to view revenue/total sales by date range (From-To)
Admin shall be able to view revenue/total sales by month
Admin shall be able to view revenue/total sales by year
Admin shall be able to export reports in PDF format
Admin shall be able to export reports in Excel format
Admin shall be able to create sub-users
Admin shall be able to edit sub-users
Admin shall be able to delete sub-users
Admin shall be able to activate sub-users
Admin shall be able to deactivate sub-users
Sub-users shall be able to operate various sectional operations
Admin shall be able to add roles for sub-admin users
Admin shall be able to edit roles for sub-admin users
Admin shall be able to delete roles for sub-admin users
Admin shall be able to activate roles
Admin shall be able to deactivate roles
Roles shall provide role-based access control
Admin shall be able to edit content for "About Us" page
Admin shall be able to edit content for "Contact Us" page
Admin shall be able to edit content for "Privacy Policy" page
Admin shall be able to edit content for "Terms and Conditions" page
Admin shall be able to add email content for buyer communications
Admin shall be able to edit email content for buyer communications
Admin shall be able to delete email content
Admin shall be able to send emails regarding new product launches
Admin shall be able to send emails regarding offers
Admin shall be able to send emails regarding promotions
Admin shall be able to view queries received from buyers
Admin shall be able to view complaints received from buyers
Admin shall be able to view feedback received from buyers
Admin shall receive email notifications for feedback/complaints/queries from buyers
System shall accommodate up to 100 concurrent users
Web pages shall not take more than 30 seconds to load with good internet speed
Web pages shall not display broken pages
Web pages shall display "page not found" error when page is not available
System shall use SSL security for online payments
System shall use encryption for online payments
System shall assume physical inventory/warehouse is established
Notes: No test scenarios mapped to this requirement

Requirement_Description: System shall assume admin manages product catalog with SKU codes
Notes: No test scenarios mapped to this requirement

Requirement_Description: System shall not support custom size and color products
Notes: No test scenarios mapped to this requirement

Requirement_Description: System shall use USD as currency
System shall accept orders from US country only
System shall NOT support ordering customized products
Notes: No test scenarios mapped to this requirement

Requirement_Description: System shall NOT support real-time order tracking
Notes: No test scenarios mapped to this requirement

Requirement_Description: System shall NOT support cash on delivery payment option
Notes: No test scenarios mapped to this requirement
